# pinecone Provider

Interact with Pinecone.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "pinecone" {
    environment = "test"
    api_key = "test_key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) The Pinecone API key to use.
- `environment` (String) The Pinecone environment to use.
